title: Hailing Island Oceanfront Escape with Three Must-Visit Restaurants
description: Breathe in that fresh sea breeze when you stay on golden sands at Crowne Plaza Hailing Island, an IHG Hotel. After days of splashy fun in the ocean, feast on mouthwatering local delicacies at Canal Luna, international favourites at the All-Day Dining Restaurant, and fresh-from-the-ocean seafood at Catch-Hot Pot. When you're not indulging in delicious dishes, take a dip in the two swimming pools, work up a sweat at the fitness centre, or enjoy a cocktail or two in the Lobby Lounge.
offer_address: Ten-Miles Silver Beach, Hailing Island, Yangjiang 529500, China
